I work on edge AI products and infrastructure.

Currently I lead a team building on-device AI infrastructure powering Gemini Nano models on Android. Prior to this, I was based in Silicon Valley, where I worked on virtual networking infrastructure at Google Cloud.
I hold an MBA from Imperial College London and an MSc in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Carnegie Mellon University.
When I'm not building, I usually hit the gym or spend time behind the decks DJing.
